tool_description: USA Restaurants database. Find restaurants near you by querying this complete and comprehensive restaurant API. The API will return 10 results per page. Please use the "page" field for pagination.
title: Restaurants near me USA

api_list.name: GET all City names
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://restaurants-near-me-usa.p.rapidapi.com/restaurants/all-city"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "restaurants-near-me-usa.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET all Restaurant locations
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://restaurants-near-me-usa.p.rapidapi.com/restaurants/location/{page}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "restaurants-near-me-usa.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET all Restaurant locations by {state} and {city}
api_list.description: GET all Restaurant locations by state and city
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://restaurants-near-me-usa.p.rapidapi.com/restaurants/location/state/{state}/city/{city}/{page}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "restaurants-near-me-usa.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
